alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 3:34PM EST until January 16 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Bennington and Windham Counties in southern Vermont. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact both the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will spread from south to north overnight and continue through the day Tuesday before ending by Tuesday evening. Snowfall rates may reach or slightly exceed a half of an inch per hour at times on Tuesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
